VALUE: text: For accuracy and service quality purposes, your call may be monitored and recorded.

text: To protect your privacy, please have two pieces of identification available.  For your convenience, you can visit Sask Energy dot com to submit your inquiry by email, request changes to your gas line, tell us that you're moving, or sign in to manage your account online.

text: Our team is dedicated to providing you with the best possible service.  Any form of discrimination, or disrespectful behaviour may result in our representative ending your call without resolving your inquiry.
